name: Operator X
description:
Operator X
In an unknown city, with a blown-up Humvee and  CIA’s most wanted terrorist lurking somewhere around. You are the faceless green beret who goes by the pseudo name Seargent X and your only mission is to kill Moosa, the leader of Alh Alharb.

Explore the city, interrogate captives, and blow up things like there is no tomorrow. Remember to make smart choices as one wrong move means fatality. Enjoy the game and remember Shoot first Die Last.

Operator X was made as a part of the class CSC582 - Computer Models of Interactive Narrative by Dr. Arnav Jhala at the NC State University in Fall 2022.

By Team 11: Mansimran Singh Anand, Arjun Sarihyan, Keerthana Telaprolu, and Shaival Pradipbhai Shah
